meanings.definition: A person who practices occult arts or studies occult knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The occultists gathered to perform a ritual under the full moon.
meanings.sent2: Many occultists believe in the power of crystals and tarot cards.
meanings.sent3: The occultists tried to summon a ghost but ended up scaring themselves instead.
meanings.sent4: Her bookshelves were filled with ancient texts that only occultists could decipher.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious shop in the corner was rumored to be run by powerful occultists.

meanings.definition: Members of a group that believes in the occult.
meanings.sent1: The small town was known for its community of occultists who held secret meetings.
meanings.sent2: Occultists often share their knowledge of the supernatural with each other.
meanings.sent3: The group of occultists decided to investigate the haunted house together.
meanings.sent4: The forest was said to be a meeting place for the local occultists during the full moon.
meanings.sent5: The old mansion was rumored to be haunted by the spirits of past occultists.
